page.title: 16A DAY AT CLUTTON SCHOOL
page.content: I came into Class 5 at 8.55 and started a maths sheet. Next we had 20 spellings to learn by Friday and 8 sentences to write, At 10.10 we went into assembly. On Mondays, Mr. Small congratulates the children who have worked well the week before.Afterwards we went by coach to Midsomer Norton for swimming lessons. Today we had to practise lengths as part of our swimming award grade 4.We got back to school at 12.45 and had a short playtime before having our school dinner. We always have a choice. Today I had chicken curry and rice with chocolate cake and custard for pudding.After dinner we sang songs from Singing Together. The Sloop John B and the Banana Boat Song are my favourites. After break we practised the high jump as part of the preparations for Sports Day.
